data.title: Arthur Miller and Inge Morath (2) Signed Books and Signed Photograph
data.meta_description: Sold for $0 |  Three items: a first edition of Chinese Encounters (1979), hardcover with dust jacket, review copy with review slip from Farrar, Straus &
data.text:
Description

Three items: a first edition of Chinese Encounters (1979), hardcover with dust jacket, review copy with review slip from Farrar, Straus & Giroux, signed in black felt tip on the title page by Arthur Miller and Inge Morath; a first edition of Salesman in Beijing (1984), hardcover with dust jacket, published by The Viking Press, signed on the title page in black ink by Arthur Miller and Inge Morath; and a glossy 6.5 x 5.25 Chinese Encounters publicity photo of Miller and Morath meeting with Szutu Huiming, signed in black felt tip by Arthur Miller and Inge Morath. In overall fine condition.
